src:
Sjajna uvertira za „Teatar snova“: Partizan nadigrao Vojvodinu u Humskoj [VIDEO]
02 Nov 2019, 15:49 by Milos
Partizan – Vojvodina 4:0 (2:0)Natho 29′, 43′ (pen), Zdjelar 48′, Sadik 69′
Partizan je deklasirao Vojvodinu u utakmici 15. kola Super lige Srbije na stadionu u Humskoj, i napravio odličnu uvertiru pred duel sa Mančester Junajtedom na Old Trafordu.
Partizan: Stojković – Miletić, Ostojić, Pavlović, Urošević – Zdjelar, Šćekić (od 77. L. Pavlović) – F. Stevanović, Natho (od 59. Suma), Asano – Sadik (od 74. Ivanović)
Vojvodina: Rockov – Veselinović, Đurić, Saničanin, Devetak – Drinčić, Đurišić (od 61. Topić) – Đuričin, Bojić, Eze (od 61. Gemović) – Matić (od 61. Nikolić)
Partizan je imao prvu polupriliku u petom minutu. Asano je dobro šutirao sa 20-ak metara, ali je Rockov bio na mestu.
Na narednu šansu čekalo se do 18. minuta. Saničan je promašio loptu u kaznenom prostoru Vojvodine, lopta je stigla do Miletića, ali je Devetak u poslednjem trunutku sjajno intervenisao ispred reprezentativca Srbije.
Sadik se u 24. minutu nakon pasa Natha stuštio ka golu Vojvodine, Đurišić je startovao sa leđa, ali se čini da je stigao do lopte. Pištaljka sudije Đurđića ostala je nema, što je izazvalo proteste publike.
Partizan je poveo u 29. minutu. Nakon kornera, sudija Đurđić je od mnoštva povlačenja duel Devetka i Ostojića okarakterisao kao prekršaj i jedanaesterac, a Bibras Natho je u svom stilu poslao Rockova u jednu stranu a loptu u drugu za vođstvo od 1:0.



Sadik je nakon okreta šutirao iz prv eu 40. minutu, ali pravo u Rockova.
Partizan je na odmor otišao sa dva gola prednosti, a ponovo je strelac bio Bibras Natho. Izraelac je odlično šutirao, nakon povratne lopte Sadika, koji je prošao po desnoj strani, i savladao Rockova.



Crno-beli su u trećem minutu nastavka postigli treći gol. Fantastično je šutirao Saša Zdjelar sa 20 metara nakon povratne lopte Sadika i Rockov je bio nemoćan.



Nakon trećeg gola Partizana, tempo je opao, a Vojvodina počela da igra onfanzivnije. U kolosalnoj šansi u 58. minutu našao se Ognjen Đuričin, koji je iskoristio nesporazum Stojkovića i Ostojića, ali je potom promašio prazan gol. Potom je udarac okušao i Drinčić, ali nije bilo promene rezultata.
Promena je došla u 69. minutu, ali na drugoj strani. Do sedmog gola u prvenstvu došao je Umar Sadik. Nakon kombinacije sa Asanom, odlično je šutirao unutrašnjom, a za razliku od meča sa Mančester Junajtedom, kada je pogodio stativu, lopta se zakoprcala u mreži.



Drinčić je dobro zagrejao dlanove Stojkovića, Partizan je pokušavao preko Ivanovića i Filipa Stevanovića, ali više nije bilo promene rezultata.
Partizan se ovim trijumfom primakao trećeplasiranoj Vojvodini na bod zaostatka, uz meč manje.

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
Great Overture for Dream Theater: Partizan Outplayed Vojvodina in Humska [VIDEO]
02 Nov 2019, 15:49 by Milos
Partizan - Vojvodina 4: 0 (2-0) Natho 29 ′, 43 ′ (pen), Zdjelar 48 ′, Sadik 69 ′
Partizan declared Vojvodina in the game of the 15th round of the Super League of Serbia at the stadium in Humska, and made a great overture before the duel with Manchester United at Old Traford.
Partizan: Stojkovic - Miletic, Ostojic, Pavlovic, Urosevic - Zdjelar, Scekic (from 77 L. Pavlovic) - F. Stevanovic, Natho (from 59th Sum), Asano - Sadik (from 74. Ivanovic)
Vojvodina: Rockov - Veselinovic, Djuric, Sanicanin, Devetak - Drincic, Djurisic (from 61. Topic) - Djuricin, Bojic, Eze (from 61. Gemovic) - Matic (from 61. Nikolic)
Partizan had the first half in the fifth minute. Asano shot well from 20 yards out, but Rockov was in place.
The next chance was waiting until the 18th minute. Sanican missed the ball in Vojvodina's penalty area, the ball reached Miletic, but Devetak intervened brilliantly in front of the Serbian national team in the last moment.
Sadik made his way to Vojvodina's goal in the 24th minute after Natha's pass, Djurisic started from the back, but appeared to have reached the ball. Judge Djurdjic's gun remained silent, sparking protests from the audience.
Partizan led in the 29th minute. After a corner kick, Judge Djurdjic described the duel of Devetko and Ostojic as a foul and a penalty shootout, with Bibras Natho sending Rockov to one side and the ball to the other for a 1-0 lead.



Sadik fired a shot from the first in the 40th minute, but straight into the Rocks.
Partizan went on a break with two goals and again the scorer was Bibras Natho. The Israeli great shot, after a backhand from Sadik, who passed on the right, and overcame Rock's.



The Black and Whites scored the third goal in the third minute of the game. Fantastic shot by Sasha Zdjelar from 20 yards after Sadik's return ball and Rockov was powerless.



After Partizan's third goal, the tempo dropped and Vojvodina began to play onfensively. On a colossal chance in the 58th minute was Ognjen Djuricin, who exploited the misunderstanding between Stojkovic and Ostojic, but then missed an empty goal. Drinčić then tried the shot, but there was no change in the result.
The change came in the 69th minute, but on the other side. Umar Sadik reached the seventh goal in the championship. After combining with Asan, he did a great shot inside, and unlike the match against Manchester United, when he hit a tripod, the ball stuck in the net.



Drincic warmed Stojkovic's palms well, Partizan tried through Ivanovic and Filip Stevanovic, but there was no change in results.
With this triumph Partizan moved closer to third place Vojvodina by a point behind, with the match less.
